properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Physical, Guard

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 10% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 1430% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 48 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 897 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 74% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
enchantMods: Your Meteor Towers create Burning Ground for 3 seconds on Hit
explicitMods: 48% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

items.name: Ghoul Fingers
implicitMods: Inflict Fire Exposure on Hit, applying -11% to Fire Resistance

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
